import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Navbar(_ref){let{SiteName}=_ref;// State variables for background color and padding top

const[TextColor,setTextColor]=useState("white");const[TextHoverColor,setTextHoverColor]=useState("black");// useEffect to handle scroll event and update background color and padding top
useEffect(()=>{const handleScroll=()=>{// Change background color and padding top based on scroll position
if(window.scrollY>100){setBgColor("white");setPaddingTop("0px");// Change padding top
setTextColor("black");setTextHoverColor("black");}else{setBgColor("transparent");setPaddingTop("2vh");// Reset padding top
setTextColor("white");}};// Add event listener when component mounts

return()=>{window.removeEventListener("scroll",handleScroll);};},[]);// useEffect to save background color and padding top to localStorage
